content.partII: I'm a web developer from Taiwan with a passion for creating user-friendly web experiences. I enjoy exploring the structure and context of code to better understand how everything works together.
content.partIII: My coding journey began during my time as a software PM. I had a passion for figuring out the logic behind web and especially interested in how web interact with users. This led me to pursue a career in front-end development.
content.partIV: Currently, I'm focused on developing products at <anchor>Castles</anchor> , ensuring user-friendly experiences with clean, maintainable code.
content.partV: I also love sharing, I enjoy writing articles in <anchor>Medium</anchor> to share the skills I've picked up.
